column5: What sports shows do any of you visit to book your trips to Canada or talk to your outfitter?We go to the Eastern Sports & Outdoor Show in Harrisburg, PA. Largest show in the country and has hundreds of fishing/hunting outfitters. Great way to spend a winter day!

The Eastern Sports & Outdoor Show is now the new "The Great American Outdoor Show" and run by the NRA.http://www.greatamericanoutdoorshow.org/ Reed got the boot last year after refusing to allow AR-15 type rifles to be displayed...good riddance too.
I don't think so. Pennsylvannia will defend the 2nd Amendment...and we once again booted the Brit's back to the UK.Land of the free and the home of the brave.
